title: Between the Scenes - Scarlett Johansson and the Debate Over Representation in Film
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Scarlett Johansson and the Debate Over Representation in Film
description:
Trevor addresses Scarlett Johansson's controversial comment that she should be "allowed to play any person, or any tree" and discusses the power of representation on screen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
